question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. blue flag with letter on it
B. post office sign
C. None
D. None

options.A: blue flag with letter on it

triage_reason: The blue flag is positioned higher and further back in the scene, above the crowd and buildings, while the post office sign is on a nearby building at a similar or slightly closer depth, making the flag clearly further away.
